heroSection.subtitle: Your Voice in Nepal's Democratic Future

description.p1: Nepal's democracy is at a crossroads. This platform is where citizens shape the future, through ideas, debate, and action. From tackling corruption to rethinking elections, your voice can turn protest into progress.
description.p2: Born from the bold energy of Gen Z, and strengthened by the wisdom and support of experts, professionals, and concerned Nepalis of all ages and sectors, this movement is bigger than any one generation.
description.p3: This manifesto isn't just words, it's a roadmap for a just, accountable Nepal.

hero.title: Nepal Reform Manifesto
hero.description: Explore 27 comprehensive reform proposals for Nepal's democratic transformation. Each proposal includes detailed solutions, real-world evidence, implementation timelines, and performance targets based on international best practices.

howToEngage.title: How to Engage:
steps: Read the Reform Agendas listed below.
Explore the Full Manifesto — available in both English and Nepali (top right of this page).
Vote on the Reform Agendas to show your support.
Sign In to access the suggestion form if you notice something missing.
Email Us Your Feedback — compile your thoughts and send them to: suggestions@nepalreforms.com
Spread the Word — share this platform with your friends, family, neighbors, and colleagues.
